lines.text:
[heading for crematorium]
Dust to dust, ash to ash. Let's take him downstairs and burn his ass.
What kind of a monster am I? I mean, we can't have two men in the same cell. That's not humane. Well, there's only one thing to do. We'll just have to have an execution tonight.
You could execute an innocent man, too. And then what would you say?
With the assistance of the Department of Water and Power, the Holy Spirit, yay, the Holy Spirit, visited us!
Come on, man, it's cold. I really don't wanna be here all night.
